headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Pegassi Toreador Shark Livery
content:
All those who jump into GTA Online any time between January 14 - 20 will receive the Shark Livery for the Pegassi Toreador, a military wrap guaranteed to inspire shock and awe in equal measure while keeping your vehicle hermetically sealed under pressure.

And for those gearheads and drivers who unlocked the Pegassi Tee last year, youâ€™ll be awarded this week with a vintage Faded variant of the tee to show your longstanding loyalty to the Italian luxury brand.
